name: High Roller (DarkMatterZero)
description:
This is a Submission for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

Use WASD to move and LMB to shoot
Use SPACE to dodge enemies by rolling your body and your stats
Click on the dice icons to LOCK up to 2 dice, but they'll unlock if you get hit

It's a little unfinished, but we hope you enjoy!
